name: Chicken of the Caribbean
description:
A way more polished version of our  entry for the Global Game  Jam 2021 :)

Yarrr! 

Sail the seven seas as merry rubber chicken pirates to grow your crew and discover distant islands. On your adventure you will encounter the ruthless ducky marine, poisonous wildlife, and mighty treasures!

Our Crew

Art - Celine, Dirk, Miri, Philipp

Musik - Simon

Programming - Daniel, Dirk, Dominik, Philipp, Simon

Extra thanks to

- Chasing Carrots for the organization

- Hydra Bot for keeping us grooving
